    • core.UserActionFactory

extends java.lang.Object

      HighlightTracker instance for creating TextHighlighted instances.

      KeyReader instance for creating KeyTyped and StringTyped instances.

    • Method Summary

      Creates an instance of KeyTyped (waiting for character from 'a' to 'z').

      Creates an instance of TextHighlighted.
      TimeReached createTimeReached()
      Creates an instance of TimeReached (all its properties, like year, month, day etc. can be set after created).

    • Method Detail

      • createKeyTyped

        public KeyTyped createKeyTyped(char keyExpected)
        Creates an instance of KeyTyped (waiting for character from 'a' to 'z').
        Parameters:
        keyExpected - the expected character KeyTyped will be waiting for after activated.
        Returns:
        KeyTyped instance

      • createKeyTyped

        public KeyTyped createKeyTyped(int keyExpectedUnicode)
        Creates an instance of KeyTyped (waiting for 'any' key hit on keyboard).
        Parameters:
        keyExpectedUnicode - unicode of the key to expected hit. Use KeyEvent static attributes for determining unicode of keys.
        Returns:
        KeyTyped instance.

      • createStringTyped

        public StringTyped createStringTyped(java.lang.String stringExpected)
        Creates an instance of StringTyped.
        Parameters:
        stringExpected - the list of characters that will be waited for to be typed (in the given sequence).
        Returns:
        StringTyped instance

      • createTextHighlighted

        public TextHighlighted createTextHighlighted()
        Creates an instance of TextHighlighted.
        Returns:
        TextHighlighted instance.

      • createTimeReached

        public TimeReached createTimeReached()
        Creates an instance of TimeReached (all its properties, like year, month, day etc. can be set after created).
        Returns:
        TimeReached instance
